Interactive District Map
========================

Citywide Mayor and At-Large positions are shown below. Click on a La Porte City Council District on the map below to find district representation. (For a full-screen version of the map, [view the map](https://laporte.maps.arcgis.com/apps/webappviewer/index.html?id=c5fd5f52a71e4795b415f912a0e2231f&mobileBreakPoint=300) on our GIS platform.)

To email the entire Council as a group, use LPCityCouncil@LaPorteTX.gov. For individual Councilmembers, visit our [Mayor & Council webpage](https://www.laportetx.gov/153/Mayor-Council).
